rayIntersectionZeroLockControl - Variable in class fast3d.renderables.Line
on ray-intersection-computing (ray tracing) it is normally impossible to target a mathematical line (with actual no width) using rastered rays like when displaying an universe to any computer screen
rayIntersectionZeroLockControl - Variable in class fast3d.renderables.Pixel
on ray-intersection-computing (ray tracing) it is normally impossible to target a mathematical point (with actual no width) using rastered rays like when displaying an universe to any computer screen
rayTrace(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.complex.Group
a group is targeted if any of its triangles is targeted
does not necessarily return the nearest to rayOrig puncture point
rayTrace(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.complex.Object
an object is targeted if any of its groups is targeted
does not necessarily return the nearest to rayOrig puncture point
rayTrace(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.complex.Scene
a scene is targeted if any of its objects is targeted
rayTrace(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in interface fast3d.complex.Universe
1)on a picking-action on the holding panel3d this method is called to determine, which Renderables may be targeted
2)on a lighting-calculation the lighting-method will call rayTrace to determine whether some rays of light my be obstructed and now some objects lay in the shadow
this method should call rayTrace for every Renderable that is in the universes internal storage and list the Renderables which return not null from that method in a result-list
rayTrace(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in interface fast3d.Renderable
for 3d-clicks on a panel3d or some lighting/shadowing calculation it is important to determine whether a renderable has some puncture point with a ray
may return null
rayTrace(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Callout
rayTrace is not supported for callouts
rayTrace(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.HUD

Relationship - Enum in fast3d.util.math
Characterizes the relationship of two points, lines or plates
RelationshipAnalytics - Class in fast3d.util.math
this class offers some static functionalities to analyze the relationship between points, straights and plates mathematically sometimes (if rational) a method is available with overloading to a parameter zeroLockControl:
if the straights or plates may be intersecting; due to rounding errors of the computer the intersection may not be detected properly so it might be helpful to consider a slight rounding-mistake (0.0...01 may do)
if the given value zeroLockControl is lower or equal 0 no mistake is considered and the check of intersection will be done on double == double
RelationshipAnalytics() - Constructor for class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics

rref(double[][]) - Static method in class fast3d.math.MatrixCalculation
edits the parameter
reduced row echelon form (rref)
the result of a linear equation system can be determined directly if its matrix is in the rref
at this point it is magic
